text:
The Sar'ka is a compact [[hand crossbow]] employing superior alloys and sophisticated engineering used by the [[Khesh'dar]] (particularly the Shaarat'khesh). The name roughly translates to "Little Pair" in the [[Goblin]] language. The crossbow can loose four projectiles before requiring a reload.

See also [[Aram'kron]].
title: Sar'ka
